official_title: A bill to provide for a temporary reduction in duty on imported fresh, chilled, or frozen brussels sprouts.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a reduction through December 30, 1987, in the duty on certain brussels sprouts that are not reduced in size and certain brussels sprouts that are reduced in size.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a temporary reduction in duty on imported fresh, chilled, or frozen brussels sprouts.
